entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11 except minus 5 over southern sections. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11 except minus 5 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
